title: Implement Core Branding Constants
description: Create the branding.js file in mcp-server/src/constants/ with all branding constants including product name, tagline, copyright notice, CLI banner, ASCII logo, colors, and helper functions.

title: Update Core Server Files
description: Update mcp-server/src/index.js and mcp-server/server.js to incorporate branding constants and display branded startup messages.

title: Implement Tool Response Branding
description: Update all MCP tools to incorporate branding in their responses, including product name, trademark notices, and branded error messages.

title: Implement Logger Branding
description: Update the logger.js file to incorporate branding in log messages, including branded formatting and a startup method to display the CLI banner.

title: Update Package.json with Branding
description: Update package.json with branding information including product name, description, keywords, author, homepage, repository, and trademark notice.

title: Create Branding Verification Script
description: Create a verification script (scripts/verify-branding.js) to check that branding constants are loaded correctly and display key branding information.
